snippet: The Manchester Fisher Cats issued a statement reiterating zero-tolerance for abusive language after Boston Red Sox outfielder Carl Crawford said a fan yelled a racial slur at him.
lead_paragraph: The Manchester Fisher Cats issued a statement reiterating zero-tolerance for abusive language after Boston Red Sox outfielder Carl Crawford said a fan yelled a racial slur at him.

headline.seo: Fan Yells Racial Slur at Red Sox’ Carl Crawford
headline.main: Fan Yells Racial Slur at Red Sox Outfielder
